meanings.definition: The quality or state of being subtle.
meanings.sent1: Her subtleness in choosing the perfect gift always impressed her friends.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting displayed a beautiful subtleness in its use of colors.
meanings.sent3: The detective's subtleness in solving the case left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: The subtleness of the melody brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The subtleness of the perfume lingered in the air long after she had left.

meanings.definition: The ability to make fine distinctions or perceive delicate differences.
meanings.sent1: His subtleness in taste allowed him to distinguish even the slightest flavors.
meanings.sent2: The subtleness of her hearing enabled her to pick up on subtle changes in the environment.
meanings.sent3: The subtleness of his sense of humor often caught people off guard.
meanings.sent4: The subtleness of her intuition was like a superpower.
meanings.sent5: The subtleness of his touch was comforting and gentle.
